DataElement.preferredName: Exposure as Collected Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Dose Method Other Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A Yes/No indicator to describe whether patient is treated using other dosing method.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Exposure as Collected Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Dose Method Other
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the exposure as collected domain._A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.:Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Exposure as Collected Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Dose Method
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the exposure as collected domain._A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.

Concepts.longName: Exposure as Collected Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset
Concepts.definition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the exposure as collected domain.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.
Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient being treated using another dosing method?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF TEXT 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient being treated using another infant dosing method (e.g., the 30-Rule)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient being treated using another infant dosing method (e.g., the 30-Rule), but can receive a vincristine dose taken from the infant dosing table?
